channel.title: Project KieransBossScape
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i146.photobucket.com/albums/r273/kieranistheone4u/bossy12.jpg[/img][/CENTER] Some people may know KieransBossScape My server has been going on and off for some time now and i just want to get this up and running ASAP, So i thought why not start from fresh, Take it slow and see what i come up with, So that's what i decided to do. [U]Note: There are a few bugs on the server so, Bare with me.[/U] [U]KieransBossScape Features[/U] [LIST] [*]Fully working defence bonus. [*]Quests. [*]Added Custom Shops! [*]Removed summoning! [*]Made all quests appear (Now i have to make them work :S) [*]Added ::starter command (Only can be used once a day!) [*]Made it so that you must first read the rules before you are able to move! [*]Changed starting equipment! [*]Made Varrock a safe zone! [*]Added Melee. [*]Add Strength. [*]Added Defence. [*]Added Mage. [*]Added Prayer. [*]Added Range. [*]Made it so that you can wear a phat at lvl 1 defence! [*]Added Defence, Strength, & Attack Emotes. [*]Added Global Objects! [*] Added New Shops! [*] Changed Starting Spot! [*]Fixed pking bug. [*]All new training area. [/LIST] There are plenty more updates but i cant be asked typeing them. [B][U]Connection[/U][/B] Port - 43594 Ip - Kieranbossscape.no-ip.org [B][U]KieransBossScape Client[/U][/B] [LIST] [*]Added Sprites [*]Changed the log in screen! [*]Changed the loading bar color! [*]New side icons! [*]Custom Spell Icons! [*]Custom admin/mod Crowns! [*]Custom inventory background! [*]Added Working Compass, And also gave it a new look! [*]Made Fire Cape flow/move what ever you want to call it Credits - Mith for makeing client [/LIST] [CENTER][/CENTER] [B][/B] [B][U]Coders[/U][/B] [LIST] [*]Kieran [*].... [*].... [*].... [*].... [*].... [*].... [*].... [/LIST]
[center]LOOKING FOR CODERS[/center]
If you have any questions or would like to code for the server contact me on [email]kieran_is_da_best@hotmail.com[/email]

item.title: Project KieransBossScape
item.dc:creator: @she_bitch she bitch
item.description:
@she_bitch wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Some people may know KieransBossScape
My server has been going on and off for some time now and i just want to get this up and running ASAP, So i thought why not start from fresh, Take it slow and see what i come up with, So that’s what i decided to do.

Note: There are a few bugs on the server so, Bare with me.

KieransBossScape Features
[LIST]
[]Fully working defence bonus.
[]Quests.
[]Added Custom Shops!
[]Removed summoning!
[]Made all quests appear (Now i have to make them work :S)
[]Added ::starter command (Only can be used once a day!)
[]Made it so that you must first read the rules before you are able to move!
[]Changed starting equipment!
[]Made Varrock a safe zone!
[]Added Melee.
[]Add Strength.
[]Added Defence.
[]Added Mage.
[]Added Prayer.
[]Added Range.
[]Made it so that you can wear a phat at lvl 1 defence!
[]Added Defence, Strength, & Attack Emotes.
[]Added Global Objects!
[] Added New Shops!
[] Changed Starting Spot!
[]Fixed pking bug.
[]All new training area.
[/LIST]

There are plenty more updates but i cant be asked typeing them.

Connection
Port - 43594
Ip - Kieranbossscape.no-ip.org

KieransBossScape Client
[LIST]
[]Added Sprites
[]Changed the log in screen!
[]Changed the loading bar color!
[]New side icons!
[]Custom Spell Icons!
[]Custom admin/mod Crowns!
[]Custom inventory background!
[]Added Working Compass, And also gave it a new look!
[*]Made Fire Cape flow/move what ever you want to call it

Credits - Mith for makeing client
[/LIST]

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Coders
[LIST]
[]Kieran
[]…
[]…
[]…
[]…
[]…
[]…
[]…
[/LIST]

[center]LOOKING FOR CODERS[/center]

If you have any questions or would like to code for the server contact me on kieran_is_da_best@hotmail.com
